thing-type.label: Homie MQTT Device
thing-type.description: You need a configured Broker first. This Thing represents an MQTT device, that follows the Homie Convention.

parameter.name: deviceid
parameter.label: Device ID
parameter.description: Homie device ID. This is part of the MQTT topic (e.g., homie/deviceid/$homie).

parameter.name: removetopics
parameter.label: Remove Retained Topics
parameter.description: Remove retained topics when the Thing is deleted
